data.description: Additional information for a transaction. It can contain a simple message, a function call, an ESDT transfer payload, and so on.

esdtValues.description: A list of ESDT values that are transferred based on the data field.

fee.description: The amount of EGLD the sender paid for the transaction.

function.description: The name of the function that is called in case of a smart contract call.

gasLimit.description: The maximum gas units the sender is willing to pay for.

gasPrice.description: The amount to be paid for each gas unit.

gasUsed.description: The amount of gas used by the transaction.

hasOperations.description: True if the transaction has smart contract results.

hasLogs.description: True if the transaction has logs.

hasScResults.description: True if the transaction has smart contract results.

initialPaidFee.description: The initial amount of EGLD the sender paid for the transaction, before the refund.

isRelayed.description: True if the transaction is a relayed transaction.

isScCall.description: True if the transaction is a smart contract call.

miniBlockHash.description: The hash of the miniblock in which the transaction was included.

nonce.description: The transaction sequence number of the sender address.

operation.description: The operation of the transaction based on the data field.

receiver.description: The destination address of the transaction.

receiverShard.description: The shard ID of the receiver address.

receivers.description: A list of receiver addresses in case of ESDTNFTTransfer or MultiESDTTransfer.

receiversShardIDs.description: A list of receiver addresses shard IDs.

receiverUserName.description: The username of the receiver address.

round.description: The round of the block when the transaction was executed.

sender.description: The address of the transaction sender.

senderShard.description: The shard ID of the sender address.

senderUserName.description: The username of the sender address.

signature.description: The signature of the transaction, hex-encoded.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transaction was executed.

tokens.description: A list of ESDT tokens that are transferred based on the data field. The indices from the `tokens` list are linked with the indices from `esdtValues` list.

value.description: The amount of EGLD to be sent from the sender to the receiver.
